text: Hi. I have a web page featuring a number of Wistia videos each included as a “popover embed”. Is it possible to generate a unique URL for each so that if someone visits that particular URL, the relevant video popup is triggered?

Hello! Is there way to capture a unique landing page URL and have it populate into a hidden field on a HubSpot form? I  have an idea of what how I want to do it, but want to ask here before I do anything!!!
